sentences.sContent: Resourcing incubation has to be a part of planning – otherwise the natural tendency is to suck up all the resources for the critical activity of the day.
sentences.sContent_eng: Resourcing incubation has to be a part of planning – otherwise the natural tendency is to suck up all the resources for the critical activity of the day.
sentences.sCn: 为孵化项目分配资源必须是计划的一部分，否则所有的资源都会被日常紧要事务所占用，这是自然的趋势。

sentences.sContent: One of the things that I think about often is how do I cultivate a culture in my team that encourages, empowers and rewards/recognizes incubation efforts.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of the things that I think about often is how do I cultivate a culture in my team that encourages, empowers and rewards/recognizes incubation efforts.
sentences.sCn: 怎样在我的团队中培养一种文化来鼓励、授权、奖励并认可大家在孵化项目中付出的努力是我经常考虑的事情之一。

sentences.sContent: It is caused during development by high incubation temperatures.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is caused during development by high incubation temperatures.
sentences.sCn: 这是在发育阶段由高温孵化造成的。

phrases.pCn: 发酵周期；孵育期；保温培养期
培养时间；孕育时间；孵化期

words.tran: [禽] 孵卵器；[儿科] 保温箱；早产儿保育器；细菌培养器
孵化；培养；温育；逐渐发展
